column5: 2011 2/2. Dock you boat right in front of the house! HAS 8 BEDS! 1 Queen, 1 double bunk bed, 3 twin beds, 1 twin bunk bed. Open concept kitchen and living room. Tons of outdoor hangout areas. Grill, lighted outdoor bar and palapa on the water. Shaded and sundeck. Green lights that come on daily for night fishing. Cable and washer and dryer. The house is a few blocks from the beach and just minutes to local restaurants.
